content.description:
Image 1

FRESCO PAINTED ON THE OUTER WALL OF THE MOLDOVITA MONASTERY IN ROMANIA DEPICTING THE OTTOMAN SIEGE OF CONSTANTINOPLE IN 1453

The monastery was built in 1532.

Image 2

NAKKASH OSMAN, OTTOMAN COURT PAINTER, MINIATURE DEPICTING AN OTTOMAN SIEGE OF A EUROPEAN CITY DURING THE REIGN OF SULTAN SÜLEYMAN I (1520–1566)

The image was produced for an official history of the Ottoman Empire compiled circa 1585.
content.question: Image 1 best illustrates which of the following?

choices.label: The importance of slave soldiers to Ottoman expansion
The growing reliance on foot soldiers in the Ottoman armies
The importance of gunpowder to Ottoman expansion
The increasing professionalization of the Ottoman officer corps

content.answer: The importance of gunpowder to Ottoman expansion

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
